criteria.name: Non-text Content
criteria.description: All non-text content has a text alternative.

criteria.name: Info and Relationships
criteria.description: Information, structure, and relationships conveyed through presentation can be programmatically determined.

criteria.name: Keyboard
criteria.description: All functionality is available from a keyboard.

criteria.name: Link Purpose (In Context)
criteria.description: The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or from the link text together with its context.

criteria.name: Error Identification
criteria.description: If an input error is detected, it is identified and described to the user in text.
